title: Verify that the UCI score is updated through GCP flow
custom_summary: Verify that the UCI score is updated through GCP flow
custom_preconds: Configure GCS ready and UCIDownloader subscribe to pub/sub topic
custom_steps:
- Enable UCIDownloader
- Uploading a new UCI score file to a GCS bucket.
- Wait for the notification to be sent via the Pub/Sub channel.
- Monitor UCIDownloader log.
- Check UCIDownloader service for receiving the notification.
- Verify if the UCI score file has been downloaded to the designated location on the NSProxy node.
- Check if the downloaded file has been processed by UCIDownloader.
- Check the UCI score file has been update.
custom_expected:
- UCIDownloader should download UCI score file from GCS.
- Each UCI score update should be update periodically.
